translation.en: Ball one to Johnny Damon and we are under way.
translation.zh: 约翰尼戴蒙 一环球

translation.en: Damon has eight hits in 18 at bats...
translation.zh:
戴蒙的18个打数之中
有8个安打

translation.en: ...a double, a triple, a couple of stolen bases.
translation.zh:
一次二垒安打 一次三垒安打
两次盗垒

translation.en: He had four hits in the series opener.
translation.zh:
他在赛季首场比赛中
击出四次安打

translation.en: Strike.
translation.zh: 好球

translation.en: Down the right-field line, fair off the bat of Damon.
translation.zh:
球击到右外野边线
这是一记界内球

translation.en: It rolls by Spencer.
translation.zh: 斯宾塞漏接了

translation.en: And Damon will coast into second base with a leadoff double.
translation.zh: 第一棒的戴蒙打出了二垒安打

translation.en: Into right-center field, broken bat, it'll fall, a base hit.
translation.zh:
球飞入了中右外野 断棒
落下来了 安打

translation.en: They wave around Damon. He will score.
translation.zh: 他们向戴蒙示意 他要得分了

translation.en: And Jason Giambi delivers...
translation.zh: 杰森吉安比

translation.en: ...with a run-scoring single here in the opening inning.
translation.zh:
击出一记安打
帮助队友在第一局中得分

translation.en: And the Athletics have taken that 1-nothing lead.
translation.zh: 奥克兰运动家队1比0领先

translation.en: Go, come on, now. We gotta spin it.
translation.zh: 各位 加油

translation.en: Let's go, Yankees! Let's go, Yankees!
translation.zh: 加油 洋基队

translation.en: Let's go, Yankees!
translation.zh: 加油 洋基队

translation.en: Bases loaded.
translation.zh: 满垒

translation.en: The Yankees have the tying run at second, down 2-nothing.
translation.zh:
洋基队如果打出二垒安打就能追平
现在比分是2比0

translation.en: The A's are kicking it and throwing it all over the field.
translation.zh: 运动家队漏接了 正在满场追球

translation.en: And it might lead to their elimination if they don't get it right in a hurry.
translation.zh:
如果不迅速改变局势
他们可能被淘汰

translation.en: Hammered down the right-field line. Justice!
translation.zh:
球被打到了右外野边线
加斯蒂斯！

translation.en: The Yankees have taken the lead.
translation.zh: 洋基队领先了

translation.en: They're standing, anticipating another trip...
translation.zh: 他们伫立着 期待着

translation.en: ...to the League Championship Series.
translation.zh: 又一次挺进联盟冠军赛

translation.en: The Yankees one out away.
translation.zh: 洋基队只需要解决最后一位打者

translation.en: Eric Byrnes, never with an at bat in Yankee Stadium...
translation.zh:
埃里克布赖恩斯
他在洋基体育馆还未有过打数

translation.en: ...and they don't get much bigger than this one.
translation.zh: 这一击至关重要

translation.en: Or more hectic when you're up there trying to get a job done.
translation.zh: 它将决定整场比赛

translation.en: And they're a strike away.
translation.zh: 挥棒落空

translation.en: And they're roaring in the Bronx.
translation.zh: 纽约布朗克斯区变成欢乐的海洋

translation.en: Losing the first two games at home in the best-of-five series...
translation.zh:
洋基队在五场三胜的分区赛中
输掉了前两场主场比赛

translation.en: ...and roar back to--
translation.zh: 而现在 他们重新获得了

translation.en: The Yankees will defend their title.
translation.zh: 卫冕的机会

translation.en: It's okay, Joe, you can leave it on.
translation.zh: 没关系 乔 开着吧

translation.en: -I don't need to watch. -Joe, leave it on.
translation.zh:
-我可以不看
-乔 开着吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Imagine how bad it'd be if you were a Yankee player...
translation.zh: 伊斯林霍森 吉安比 戴蒙 想像一下 如果你是洋基队的队员

translation.en: ...and didn't like the taste of champagne.
translation.zh:
而你又不喜欢喝香槟
那该怎么办？

translation.en: Better ask to get traded.
translation.zh: 最好请求转会吧

translation.en: You gotta give the Yankees--
translation.zh: 必须让洋基队

translation.en: --win the big game.
translation.zh: 赢得比赛

translation.en: What a series that is gonna be in the next....
translation.zh: 接下来的比赛

translation.en: You know how many kids are wearing Giambi's--?
translation.zh:
知道有多少孩子
穿着吉安比的球衣吗？

translation.en: You know, Oakland Giambi's jerseys and hats and pictures and posters?
translation.zh:
知道吉安比的球衣 帽子和海报
在奥克兰销量多好吗？

translation.en: Those same kids will be booing in July when the Yankees come here.
translation.zh:
这些孩子等到七月洋基队来了
就会嘘他们了

translation.en: Is it Giambi that's stabbing the back or the Pinstripes on the East Coast?
translation.zh:
我们应该怪吉安比
还是怪洋基队的金元攻势？

translation.en: You can't blame them for pilfering the henhouse.
translation.zh: 不能怪他们巧取豪夺

translation.en: -The henhouse is there. -I can't blame them?
translation.zh:
-毕竟这是合理的买卖
-不能怪他们？

translation.en: They're offering $120 million over six years.
translation.zh: 六年里他们出了一亿两千万美元

translation.en: The Yankees have deeper pockets and they're willing to give him money.
translation.zh:
洋基队比我们有钱
愿意给球员更多的钱

translation.en: They're pilfering our players.
translation.zh: 于是偷走了我们的球员

translation.en: It's like we're a farm system for the New York Yankees.
translation.zh: 我们就像纽约洋基队的青训营一样

translation.en: -How are the guys doing? -That was a killer.
translation.zh:
-球员们怎么样了？
-他们很伤心

translation.en: That was a killer. It's a tough one to swallow. It's....
translation.zh: 他们很伤心 很难接受...

translation.en: -They played great. -They played their hearts out.
translation.zh:
-他们表现得很好
-他们已经拼尽了全力

translation.en: They did. They played fantastic. It just didn't fall our way.
translation.zh:
确实拼尽了全力
只可惜结果不如人意

translation.en: -You'll do better next year. -But we were close, though.
translation.zh:
-明年会打得更好的
-但就差一点点

translation.en: -We were so close. -Right there.
translation.zh:
-就差一点
-就在那里

translation.en: Almost had it. You gotta feel good about that.
translation.zh: 差点就赢了 应该开心的

translation.en: I feel great about it. I feel great about it.
translation.zh: 我很开心

translation.en: We're not gonna do better next year.
translation.zh: 我们明年不可能打得更好

translation.en: -Why not? -Well, you know we're being gutted.
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-你知道 我们的人都被挖走了

translation.en: We're losing Giambi, Damon, Isringhausen.
translation.zh: 吉安比 戴蒙 伊斯林霍森

translation.en: Done deal. We're in trouble.
translation.zh: 都已经签了 我们麻烦大了

translation.en: You'll find new guys. You found Jason, you found Damon.
translation.zh:
你会找到新人的
杰森 戴蒙都是你找到的

translation.en: -I need more money, Steve. -Billy.
translation.zh:
-我需要更多的钱 斯蒂夫
-比利

translation.en: -I need more money. -We don't have any.
translation.zh:
-我需要更多的钱
-我们一分钱都没有

translation.en: I can't compete against $120 million with $38 million.
translation.zh:
我不能用3800万美元
跟1亿2000万美元相比

translation.en: We're not gonna compete with these teams that have big budgets.
translation.zh: 我们不会跟这些财大气粗的球队比

translation.en: We're gonna work within the constraints we have...
translation.zh: 我们要在能力范围之内运作

translation.en: ...and you're gonna do the best job that you can recruiting new players.
translation.zh:
你只需尽自己的所能
选新的球员

translation.en: We're not gonna pay $17 million to players.
translation.zh:
我们不会向球员支付
1700万美元

translation.en: I'm not asking you...
translation.zh: 我不是要你

translation.en: ...for 10 or 20, 30 million dollars.
translation.zh: 出一千万 两千万 三千万美元

translation.en: I'm just asking for a bit of help.
translation.zh: 我只是想要一点帮助

translation.en: Get me a little closer and I will get you that championship team.
translation.zh:
再帮我一下
我就能帮你组成冠军队

translation.en: I mean, this is why I'm here. This is why you hired me.
translation.zh:
这就是我在这里的原因
就是你请我的原因

translation.en: And I gotta ask you, what are we doing here...
translation.zh: 我问你 如果我们的目的...

translation.en: -Billy, I-- -...if it's not to win a championship?
translation.zh:
-比利 我...
-不是为了赢得冠军 意义何在？

translation.en: -I wanna win just as much-- -That's my bar. My bar is here.
translation.zh:
-我也想赢...
-这就是我的目标 在这里

translation.en: My bar is to take this team to the championship.
translation.zh: 我的目标就是带领队伍赢得冠军

translation.en: Billy, we're a small-market team, and you're a small-market GM.
translation.zh:
比利 我们是小球队
而你是小球队的经理

translation.en: I'm asking you to be okay not spending money that I don't have.
translation.zh:
我们没有钱
我需要你面对现实

translation.en: And I'm asking you to take a deep breath...
translation.zh: 我需要你深呼吸一下

translation.en: ...shake off the loss, get back in a room with your guys...
translation.zh:
尽快从失利的阴影中走出
召集队员们开一次会

translation.en: ...and figure out how to find replacements for the guys we lost...
translation.zh: 为离开的球员寻找替代者

translation.en: ...with the money that we do have.
translation.zh: 在我们的资金允许范围内想办法

translation.en: I'm not leaving here. I'm not-- I can't leave here with that.
translation.zh:
我不会就这样走
我不会带着这个答案离开

translation.en: What else can I help you with?
translation.zh: 我还能帮你什么？

translation.en: It's a good offer, and you gotta match it. I--
translation.zh:
这份报价很吸引人
你必须提出与其相当的条件

translation.en: I need another day.
translation.zh: 我需要一天时间

translation.en: His mind's pretty made up. I just think you should know that.
translation.zh: 他已经决定了 你应该知道

translation.en: -I got a call. I'll get you back. -I'll let him know.
translation.zh:
-我有电话来了 先不说了
-我会告诉他的

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Yeah? -Billy, Scott.
translation.zh:
-你好？
-比利 我是斯考特

translation.en: -Just got off the phone with Dan. -You didn't.
translation.zh:
-我刚才在跟丹打电话
-不可能

translation.en: I was surprised he called me.
translation.zh:
他竟然打电话给我
我很意外

translation.en: Stop. I got Johnny for 7.5 or he doesn't play anywhere else.
translation.zh:
别说了 我给约翰尼开价750万
不能让他到别的队

translation.en: -That's the deal you made. -Boston just upped it to 7.75.
translation.zh:
-这是你答应的
-波士顿开到了775万

translation.en: You there?
translation.zh: 还在吗？

translation.en: -We had a deal, Scott. -We have a deal, if it's 8 million.
translation.zh:
-我们之前已经说定了 斯考特
-没问题 但是要800万

translation.en: -Oh, man, you played me. -I'm just doing my job for my client.
translation.zh:
-你耍我
-我只是履行作为经纪人的职责

translation.en: No, you're playing me, and you're still playing me.
translation.zh:
不 你是在耍我
你一直都在耍我

translation.en: Congratulations, asshole. You win.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 混账 你赢了

translation.en: I like guys that got a little hair on their ass.
translation.zh: 我喜欢屁股长点毛的家伙

translation.en: He looks like a Mantle or a Mays, quite frankly.
translation.zh: 他就像曼托或者梅斯

translation.en: -He's got a baseball body. -Matty, who do you got?
translation.zh:
-他的身体素质很适合棒球
-马蒂 你说呢？

translation.en: -I like Geronimo. -Yes.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢基洛米洛
-是啊

translation.en: The guy's an athlete. Big, fast, talented.
translation.zh:
他是天生的运动员
高大 速度快 有天赋

translation.en: -Top of my list. -Clean-cut, good face.
translation.zh:
-是我的首选
-长得好看 很帅气

translation.en: -Yeah, good jaw. -Five-tools guy.
translation.zh:
-对 下巴很好看
-全能型的

translation.en: -Good-looking ballplayer. -Can he hit?
translation.zh:
-很帅气的球员
-击球怎么样？

translation.en: -He's got a beautiful swing. -The ball explodes off his bat.
translation.zh:
-他的挥棒姿势很棒
-他的击球很有爆发力

translation.en: He throws the club head at the ball, and when he connects...
translation.zh: 当他的球棒与球发生接触

translation.en: ...he drives it, it pops off the bat.
translation.zh: 球马上飞出去

translation.en: -You can hear it all over the ballpark. -A lot of pop.
translation.zh:
-整个球场都能听到响声
-击中率很高

translation.en: If he's good, why doesn't he hit good?
translation.zh:
既然他是这么出色的打击手
为什么打得不好？

translation.en: -He is a good hitter. -He'll be ready.
translation.zh:
-他是个好的打击手
-他会做好准备的

translation.en: He's gonna be a good hitter against big-league arms?
translation.zh:
面对大联盟的投手
他的击球也没问题吗？

translation.en: -Could be great. -I don't think so.
translation.zh:
-可能不错
-我不这么认为

translation.en: Kid needs at bats. Give him 400 at bats, he's gonna get better.
translation.zh:
新人需要打数
打数超过400 他就会进步的

translation.en: -He can play. -He's hit everywhere along the line.
translation.zh:
-他是个好球员
-他可以把球打向任何地方

translation.en: He's one of our guys.
translation.zh: 他是我们需要的人

translation.en: Okay, let's move on.
translation.zh: 好吧 继续吧

translation.en: -Artie, who do you like? -I like Perez. He's got a classic swing.
translation.zh:
-亚蒂 你喜欢哪一个？
-我喜欢佩雷兹 击球技术很好

translation.en: -It's a real clean stroke. -I don't know. Can't hit the curveball.
translation.zh:
-干净利落
-怎么说呢？弧线球打得不怎么样

translation.en: There's some work to be done, I'll admit that, but he's noticeable.
translation.zh: 确实需要提高 但是他很出众

translation.en: -Got an ugly girlfriend. -What's that mean?
translation.zh:
-女朋友很丑
-什么意思？

translation.en: Ugly girlfriend means no confidence.
translation.zh: 女朋友很丑 意思是不够自信

translation.en: You are full of it. Artie is right. This guy's got an attitude.
translation.zh:
你们别闹了 亚蒂说得对
这个家伙态度很好

translation.en: An attitude is good.
translation.zh: 态度很好

translation.en: He walks in a room, his dick's already been there for two minutes.
translation.zh:
他不管去到哪里
都是雄风高昂的

translation.en: He passes the eye-candy test. Got the looks.
translation.zh: 外形方面他合格了 很帅气

translation.en: He's ready to play the part. He just needs playing time.
translation.zh:
已经做好准备
只需要我们给他机会

translation.en: I'm just saying, his girlfriend is a six at best.
translation.zh:
我的意思是
他的女朋友最多六分

translation.en: Look, if we're trying to replace Giambi, this guy could be it.
translation.zh:
如果要为吉安比找替代者
这个家伙很不错

translation.en: I agree with you.
translation.zh: 我同意

translation.en: Damn, Billy, was that a suggestion?
translation.zh: 比利 这是一个暗示吗？

translation.en: Guys, you're just talking.
translation.zh: 各位 你们是在说废话

translation.en: Talking...like this is business as usual.
translation.zh: 以为我们还跟以前一样

translation.en: It's not.
translation.zh: 不一样

translation.en: We're trying to solve the problem.
translation.zh: 我们是在试着解决问题

translation.en: Not like this. You're not looking at the problem.
translation.zh:
可这样解决不了
你们没有找到问题所在

translation.en: We're very aware of the problem. I mean--
translation.zh: 我们知道问题所在...

translation.en: Okay, good. What's the problem?
translation.zh: 好吧 问题是什么？

translation.en: Look, Billy, we all understand what the problem is.
translation.zh: 比利 我们都清楚问题是什么

translation.en: -We have to-- -Okay, good. What's the problem?
translation.zh:
-我们必须...
-好 是什么？

translation.en: We have to replace three key players in our lineup.
translation.zh: 我们要为三位首发球员寻找替代者

translation.en: Nope. What's the problem?
translation.zh: 不是 问题是什么？

translation.en: We gotta replace these guys with what we have--
translation.zh:
我们要用目前的资源
为三位...

translation.en: No. What's the problem, Barry?
translation.zh: 不 问题是什么？巴里

translation.en: We need 38 home runs, 120 RBIs and 47 doubles to replace.
translation.zh:
我们需要38个全垒打 120个打点
和47个二垒安打

translation.en: The problem we're trying to solve is that there are rich teams...
translation.zh:
我们要解决的问题是
富有的球队在这里

translation.en: ...and there are poor teams, then there's 50 feet of crap...
translation.zh: 穷的球队在这里 地狱在这里

translation.en: ...and then there's us.
translation.zh: 而我们 在这里

translation.en: It's an unfair game.
translation.zh: 这游戏不公平

translation.en: And now we've been gutted. We're like organ donors for the rich.
translation.zh:
我们的人已经被挖光了
我们就像富队的器官捐献者

translation.en: Boston's taken our kidneys, Yankees have taken our heart.
translation.zh:
波士顿拿走了我们的肾
洋基队拿走了心脏

translation.en: And you guys sit around...
translation.zh: 而你们坐在这里

translation.en: ...talking the same old "good body" nonsense like we're selling jeans.
translation.zh:
讨论谁的身材更好
就像我们是在卖牛仔裤一样

translation.en: Like we're looking for Fabio.
translation.zh: 就像我们要找的是法比奥

translation.en: We got to think differently.
translation.zh: 我们必须换一种思维方式

translation.en: We are the last dog at the bowl.
translation.zh: 我们是最弱的一只狗崽

translation.en: You see what happens to the runt of the litter? He dies.
translation.zh:
知道最弱的狗崽会有什么下场吗？
死

translation.en: Billy, that's a very touching story and everything...
translation.zh: 比利 你的故事很感人

translation.en: ...but I think we're all very much aware of what we're facing.
translation.zh:
但我们都知道
面对着怎样的难题

translation.en: You have a lot of experience and wisdom in this room.
translation.zh: 你在这里很有经验 也很有智慧

translation.en: You need to have a little faith and let us do the job of replacing Giambi.
translation.zh:
你必须有点信心
让我们完成替代吉安比的工作

translation.en: Is there another first baseman like Giambi?
translation.zh:
现在有能与吉安比媲美的
一垒手吗？

translation.en: -No, not really. -No.
translation.zh:
-不 没有
-没有

translation.en: -If there was, could we afford him? -Nope.
translation.zh:
-就算有 我们请得起吗？
-不

translation.en: Then what the fuck are you talking about, man?
translation.zh: 那我们还谈什么？

translation.en: If we try to play like the Yankees in here...
translation.zh: 如果我们按洋基的方式运作

translation.en: ...we will lose to the Yankees out there.
translation.zh: 将会被洋基击败

translation.en: Boy, that sounds like fortune-cookie wisdom to me, Billy.
translation.zh: 听起来像签饼里的签语 比利

translation.en: -No, that's just logic. -Who's Fabio?
translation.zh:
-不 这是实话
-谁是法比奥？

translation.en: He's a shortstop. He's a shortstop from Seattle.
translation.zh:
他是个游击手
西雅图的游击手

translation.en: Now, this is no time to push the panic button.
translation.zh: 现在不能慌

translation.en: Our scouts will find players, Player Development will develop them.
translation.zh:
我们的球探会找到球员
然后培训他们

translation.en: We'll teach them to play Oakland A baseball.
translation.zh:
教他们按照
奥克兰运动家队的方式打球

translation.en: With all due respect, we've been doing this a long time.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 我们都有不少经验

translation.en: Why don't you just let us be responsible for replacing Giambi...
translation.zh:
为何不让我们负责
找人替代吉安比的事？

translation.en: ...with who we know that can play?
translation.zh: 让我们挑选有能力的球员？

translation.en: -Easy power. -And loose.
translation.zh:
-很轻松
-动作很协调

translation.en: Good face.
translation.zh: 外形很不错

translation.en: This son of a bitch is going in the first round.
translation.zh: 这个家伙能在第一轮被选中

translation.en: You're a premium player, Billy.
translation.zh: 你是个好球员 比利

translation.en: You can run, you can field, you can throw, you can hit...
translation.zh: 你能跑 能守 能投 能打

translation.en: ...you can hit with power.
translation.zh: 打击力量很不错

translation.en: That doesn't come along very often.
translation.zh: 这样的人并不多见

translation.en: This is Tom Martinez, national cross-checker.
translation.zh: 这位是汤姆马丁内斯 国际球探

translation.en: -How you doing? Nice to meet you. -Billy Beane.
translation.zh:
-你好 幸会
-比利宾恩

translation.en: It's been a while since I've seen a five-tool guy that can do everything.
translation.zh:
我很久没看到
一个无所不能的全能选手了

translation.en: I'm hopeful your interest in professional baseball...
translation.zh: 希望你有兴趣当职业棒球选手

translation.en: ...is as strong as ours is gonna be in getting you in this upcoming draft.
translation.zh:
因为我们很有兴趣
将你纳入我们的球队建设计划

translation.en: Mr. Beane?
translation.zh: 宾恩先生？

translation.en: Mark is ready to see you now.
translation.zh: 马克可以见你了

translation.en: -How you doing? -I'm fine.
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-我很好

translation.en: -How are you? -Good.
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-我很好

translation.en: -Hey, Billy. -Hey, Mark.
translation.zh:
-比利
-马克

translation.en: -Good to see you. Please sit down. -You too.
translation.zh:
-很高兴见到你 请坐
-我也是

translation.en: -These are the guys. Guys, Billy. -Boys.
translation.zh:
-各位 这是比利
-各位

translation.en: -How's it going? -All right. How you been?
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-我很好 你呢？

translation.en: -You're filling out that chair nicely. -I got three weeks in it right now.
translation.zh:
-这椅子你坐起来很合适
-已经坐了三周了

translation.en: Good, good, man.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Yeah, man. How you doing? -Fantastic.
translation.zh:
-你近来怎么样？
-非常好

translation.en: -Awesome. -Couldn't be better.
translation.zh:
-太好了
-好极了

translation.en: That's good to hear. I'm not gonna waste your time.
translation.zh: 那就好 我就不浪费你的时间了

translation.en: You just tell me what you're looking for.
translation.zh: 告诉我吧 你有什么事？

translation.en: Fifty million dollars in additional payroll.
translation.zh: 薪水总额增加五千万美元

translation.en: You should try Giambi.
translation.zh: 你应该试试吉安比

translation.en: I'm sorry. Too soon, right? I want this to be a friendly meeting.
translation.zh:
抱歉 太早了 是吧？
我希望这是一次友善的会面

translation.en: It's not all on your shoulders.
translation.zh: 这不全是你的责任

translation.en: -Where's Steve in this? -Steve's great.
translation.zh:
-斯蒂夫怎么说？
-他很好

translation.en: He's supportive in rebuilding this team.
translation.zh: 他很支持球队的建设

translation.en: That's what we're gonna do.
translation.zh: 我们会全力建设球队

translation.en: -So, what are you looking for? -A left-handed reliever.
translation.zh:
-你想找的是什么人？
-一个左手后援投手

translation.en: I'm thinking Ricardo Rincon.
translation.zh: 我在考虑里卡多林肯

translation.en: That's not gonna happen.
translation.zh: 那是不可能的

translation.en: Not even a discussion?
translation.zh: 连讨论的余地都没有？

translation.en: Billy, even if you could afford him, respectfully, we love him.
translation.zh:
比利 就算你买得起
原谅我这样说 我们爱他

translation.en: We're not about to let him go.
translation.zh: 我们不会放走他的

translation.en: You got this Venezuelan kid coming up.
translation.zh: 你们还有个委内瑞拉的年轻球员

translation.en: We had him. We moved him to Detroit.
translation.zh: 现在没有了 他去了底特律

translation.en: What else you thinking?
translation.zh: 你还要什么人？

translation.en: Outfielders.
translation.zh: 外野手

translation.en: -To replace Damon? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-来替代戴蒙？
-对

translation.en: -In your price range? No disrespect. -Enough, Mark.
translation.zh:
-在你的出价范围内？没别的意思
-足够了 马克

translation.en: Hollins?
translation.zh: 霍林斯？

translation.en: -García? -No.
translation.zh:
-加西亚？
-不？

translation.en: Maybe Coste.
translation.zh: 科斯特

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 没有了

translation.en: -All right, tell me about García. -To replace Johnny Damon?
translation.zh:
-好吧 加西亚是怎样的？
-让他代替约翰尼戴蒙？

translation.en: -Mark, is he healthy? -Yeah, he's healthy-ish.
translation.zh:
-马克 他的健康状况如何？
-他还算健康

translation.en: He had that back thing.
translation.zh: 他的背部有点问题

translation.en: -He'll be ready for spring ball. -I'll tell you what.
translation.zh:
-他春季就能出赛了
-这样吧

translation.en: I can give you Guthrie if you kick in some cash.
translation.zh:
我可以把古斯里给你
如果你愿意出钱的话

translation.en: -Mark Guthrie? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-马克古斯里？
-对

translation.en: -How much cash? -Two hundred K.
translation.zh:
-多少钱？
-20万

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -So García's gonna be a no. -You're kidding me, right?
translation.zh:
-不能给你加西亚
-你是在开玩笑吧？

translation.en: -You're kidding me. -I'm not.
translation.zh:
-你是在开玩笑
-不是

translation.en: Okay. Straight up, García for Guthrie, no kicker.
translation.zh:
好了 干脆点 加西亚换古斯里
不能再拒绝了

translation.en: -No kicker? -Straight up.
translation.zh:
-不能拒绝？
-干脆点

translation.en: I think it's gonna be a hard no on García, but let's just keep going.
translation.zh:
很诱人 但我还是选择留下加西亚
但是继续吧

translation.en: -What else you thinking? -What are we doing? Is this business?
translation.zh:
-你还有什么想法？
-这算什么？我们是在谈买卖吗？

translation.en: This is the way we do business in Cleveland.
translation.zh:
在克里夫兰
我们就是这样谈买卖的

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Hello. -Who are you?
translation.zh:
-你好
-你是谁？

translation.en: I'm Peter Brand.
translation.zh: 我叫彼得布兰德

translation.en: What do you do?
translation.zh: 你是做什么的？

translation.en: I'm special assistant to Mark Shapiro.
translation.zh: 我是马克夏皮罗的助手

translation.en: So, what do you do?
translation.zh: 那你是做什么的？

translation.en: Mostly player analysis right now.
translation.zh: 现在主要是球员分析

translation.en: Been on the job long? First job in baseball?
translation.zh:
做这一行久不久？
第一次在棒球行业工作？

translation.en: It's my first job anywhere.
translation.zh: 这是我的第一份工作

translation.en: -Wow, congrats. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-恭喜
-谢谢

translation.en: First job. Whose nephew are you?
translation.zh: 第一份工作 你是谁的侄子？

translation.en: Why does Mark listen to you?
translation.zh: 马克为什么听你的？

translation.en: I don't think....
I don't think he does very often.
translation.zh: 他很少听我的

translation.en: He just did.
translation.zh: 他刚刚就听了你的话

translation.en: Well, in that circumstance...
translation.zh: 那么 我想

translation.en: ...I think he was more listening to Bruce than myself.
translation.zh:
他是在听布鲁斯的
不是我的

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: I'm Peter Brand.
translation.zh: 我是彼得布兰德

translation.en: I don't give a rat's ass what your name is.
translation.zh: 我一点都不在乎你叫什么名字

translation.en: What happened in there?
translation.zh: 里面出了什么事？

translation.en: What happened in that room?
translation.zh: 那房间里出了什么事？

translation.en: I'm not quite sure what you're asking me, Mr. Beane.
translation.zh:
我不知道你在说什么
宾恩先生

translation.en: What did you tell Bruce?
translation.zh: 你告诉布鲁斯什么了？

translation.en: -I just told Bruce I like García. -You like García. Why?
translation.zh:
-我告诉布鲁斯 我喜欢加西亚
-你喜欢加西亚 为什么？

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: There is an epidemic failure within the game...
translation.zh: 联盟里的很多人

translation.en: ...to understand what is really happening.
translation.zh: 都对棒球有着错误的理解

translation.en: And this leads people who run Major League Baseball teams...
translation.zh: 许多大联盟棒球队的经营者

translation.en: ...to misjudge their players and mismanage their teams.
translation.zh:
对他们的球员和球队
做出了错误的评价

translation.en: I apologize.
translation.zh: 我道歉

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: Okay. People who run ball clubs, they think in terms of buying players.
translation.zh:
经营球队的人
他们认为在购买球员方面

translation.en: Your goal shouldn't be to buy players. Your goal should be to buy wins.
translation.zh:
你的目标不是买球员
而是买胜利

translation.en: And in order to buy wins, you need to buy runs.
translation.zh: 买胜利 就是买得分

translation.en: You're trying to replace Johnny Damon.
translation.zh: 你在试着为约翰尼戴蒙找替代者

translation.en: The Red Sox see Johnny Damon...
translation.zh: 红袜队看来

translation.en: ...and they see a star who's worth $7.5 million a year.
translation.zh:
约翰尼戴蒙是值得花费
一年750万的明星

translation.en: When I see Johnny Damon...
translation.zh: 而在我看来

translation.en: ...what I see is...
translation.zh: 约翰尼戴蒙

translation.en: ...an imperfect understanding of where runs come from.
translation.zh: 是一个不懂得得分概念的人

translation.en: The guy's got a great glove.
translation.zh: 他是个很好的防守球员

translation.en: He's a decent leadoff hitter. He can steal bases.
translation.zh: 很好的首发打者 很会盗垒

translation.en: But is he worth the $7.5 million a year...
translation.zh:
但是他真的值得花
一年750万美元吗？

translation.en: ...that the Boston Red Sox are paying him?
translation.zh:
值得波士顿红袜队
给他出这个价？

translation.en: No. No.
translation.zh: 不 不值得

translation.en: Baseball thinking is medieval.
translation.zh: 关于棒球的思维太过时了

translation.en: They are asking all the wrong questions.
translation.zh: 所问的都是错误的问题

translation.en: And if I say it to anybody, I'm ostracized. I'm a leper.
translation.zh:
如果我对任何人这样说
就会受到排斥 被认为是疯子

translation.en: So that's why I'm cagey about this with you.
translation.zh: 所以我在你面前才显得小心翼翼

translation.en: That's why--
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: I respect you, Mr. Beane, and if you want full disclosure...
translation.zh:
我尊敬你 宾恩先生
如果你允许我说实话

translation.en: ...I think it's a good thing that you got Damon off your payroll.
translation.zh: 我觉得你送走戴蒙是一件好事

translation.en: I think it opens up all kinds of interesting possibilities.
translation.zh: 这样才能带来许多有趣的可能性

translation.en: -Where you from, Pete? -Maryland.
translation.zh:
-你从哪里来的？彼得
-马里兰

translation.en: -Where'd you go to school? -Yale. I went to Yale.
translation.zh:
-在哪里上学？
-耶鲁 我上的是耶鲁大学

translation.en: -What'd you study? -Economics.
translation.zh:
-学什么？
-经济

translation.en: I studied economics.
translation.zh: 我学的是经济学

translation.en: Yale, economics and baseball.
translation.zh: 耶鲁 经济学和棒球

translation.en: You're funny, Pete.
translation.zh: 你真有意思 彼得

translation.en: Tell me, why Billy?
translation.zh: 告诉我 为什么选比利？

translation.en: What is it that makes him special?
translation.zh: 他有何特别之处？

translation.en: Very rare do you come upon a young man like Billy...
translation.zh: 我们很少遇到像比利这样的年轻人

translation.en: ...who can run, who can field, who can throw, who can hit...
translation.zh: 他能跑 能防守 能投球 能击球

translation.en: ...and who can hit with power.
translation.zh: 而且击球力量很不错

translation.en: Those five tools, you don't see that very often.
translation.zh:
同时拥有这五项技能
这可是很罕见的

translation.en: Most of the youngsters that we have an interest in...
translation.zh: 有很多让我们感兴趣的年轻人

translation.en: ...have one or two tools...
translation.zh: 只有其中一两项长处

translation.en: ...and we're hoping to develop an extra one.
translation.zh: 我们希望能培养出另外一项

translation.en: Your son has five.
translation.zh: 而你儿子五项都很出色

translation.en: We're looking at a guy that's a potential superstar for us in New York.
translation.zh: 他有希望成为纽约的明日之星

translation.en: The time is now to get him started.
translation.zh: 现在是培养他的最好时机

translation.en: We're prepared to make a sizable financial commitment.
translation.zh: 我们愿意提供优厚的待遇

translation.en: The Mets are gonna stand behind Billy...
translation.zh: 纽约大都会队将尽全力培养比利

translation.en: ...because we expect him to be our big-league center fielder.
translation.zh: 我们希望他成为大联盟中的中场手

translation.en: This check here represents the offer...
translation.zh: 这张支票

translation.en: ...that the New York Mets would be making to Billy.
translation.zh: 是纽约大都会队为比利提供的

translation.en: You do know that he's been accepted to Stanford on a full scholarship?
translation.zh:
你应该知道他获得了
斯坦福大学的全额奖学金吧？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: So he can do both?
translation.zh: 那他可以两者兼顾吗？

translation.en: Unfortunately, he can't do Stanford and professional baseball.
translation.zh:
很抱歉 他不能一边上斯坦福大学
一边当职业棒球员

translation.en: He would have to pick one or the other.
translation.zh: 他必须选择其中一样

translation.en: If he wants to be center fielder for the Mets...
translation.zh:
如果他希望成为
纽约大都会队的中场手

translation.en: ...wants to be a baseball player...
translation.zh: 希望成为棒球员

translation.en: ...he really needs to accept this as life's first occupation, first career.
translation.zh:
他必须签下这份合同
作为自己的第一份工作

translation.en: We're all told at some point we can no longer play the children's game.
translation.zh:
到了某个时刻 总会有人告诉我们
不能玩小孩子的游戏了

translation.en: We just don't know when that's gonna be.
translation.zh:
我们只是不知道
这个时刻什么时候到来

translation.en: Some of us are told at 18, some of us are told at 40, but we're all told.
translation.zh:
有些人是18岁
而有些人等到了40岁

translation.en: But this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
translation.zh: 总之 这是一生难得的机会

translation.en: We want you badly...
translation.zh: 我们很想签下你

translation.en: ...and we think that this amount of money expresses that desire.
translation.zh:
我想这笔钱
应该足够体现我们的诚意了

translation.en: Billy, this is your decision, and whatever that decision is...
translation.zh:
比利 这事由你决定
不管你做出什么决定

translation.en: ...you know it's fine with your mother and I.
translation.zh: 妈妈和我都会支持你的

translation.en: -Hello? -Hey, it's Billy Beane.
translation.zh:
-你好？
-你好 我是比利宾恩

translation.en: -Hey, what time is it? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
-现在几点了？
-我不知道

translation.en: Listen, would you have drafted me in the first round?
translation.zh:
回答我 要是你
你会在第一轮选我吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: After I left, you looked me up on your computer.
translation.zh:
我离开之后 你在电脑上
查过我的资料了

translation.en: Would you have drafted me in the first round?
translation.zh:
如果是你
你会在第一轮选我吗？

translation.en: I did, yeah. You were a good player.
translation.zh:
我确实查过了
你是个很好的球员

translation.en: Cut the crap, man.
translation.zh: 废话少说了

translation.en: Would you have drafted me in the first round?
translation.zh: 你会在第一轮选我吗？

translation.en: I'd have taken you in the ninth round. No signing bonus.
translation.zh:
我会在第九轮选你
没有签约奖金

translation.en: I imagine you would've passed and taken that scholarship.
translation.zh:
我猜你会放弃
接受斯坦福大学的奖学金

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Pack your bags, Pete.
translation.zh: 把东西收拾好吧 彼得

translation.en: I just bought you from the Cleveland Indians.
translation.zh:
我把你从
克里夫兰印地安人队买来了

translation.en: -Is it attached to that clamp? -Yeah, let me unhook it.
translation.zh:
-跟灯是连在一起的吗？
-对 我去把它拆开

translation.en: -Slide it up right there. To the left. -I did.
translation.zh:
-滑到那里 左边
-好

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -Hang on, it's wet.
translation.zh:
-对
-等等 那是湿的

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 块

translation.en: -Morning, Suzanne. Coffee on? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-早上好 苏珊 咖啡好了吗？
-是的

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -Billy Beane's office. -Hey.
translation.zh:
-比利宾恩的办公室
-你好

translation.en: -Peter Brand. -Billy.
translation.zh:
-彼得布兰德
-比利

translation.en: -How are--? Hi, how you doing? -Nice to see you.
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-很高兴见到你

translation.en: Good to have you here. Boy, you move in fast.
translation.zh:
很高兴能请你来
你的东西都搬来了

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. I got here early this morning.
translation.zh: 是啊 我早上搬来了

translation.en: -All moved in. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-全都搬来了
-对

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Hey, Billy...
translation.zh: 比利

translation.en: ...I wanted you to see these player evaluations...
translation.zh:
我希望你看一看
这些球员的评价

translation.en: ...that you asked me to do.
translation.zh: 这是你让我做的

translation.en: I asked you to do three.
translation.zh: 我让你做了三个

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -To evaluate three players. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-评估三个球员
-对

translation.en: How many did you do?
translation.zh: 你评估了几个？

translation.en: Forty-seven.
Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Actually, 51. I don't know why I lied just then.
translation.zh:
其实是51
我也不知道我为什么说谎

translation.en: Why don't you walk me through the board?
translation.zh: 给我讲解一下怎么样？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Using this equation in the upper left...
translation.zh: 使用左上角的这条方程式

translation.en: ...I'm projecting that we need to win at least 99 games...
translation.zh: 我认为我们需要赢得99场比赛

translation.en: ...in order to make it to the postseason.
translation.zh: 才能进入季后赛

translation.en: We need to score at least 814 runs in order to win those games...
translation.zh:
我们必须得到至少814分
才能赢这么多场

translation.en: ...and allow no more than 645 runs.
translation.zh: 并且最多只能失645分

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: This is a code that I've written for our year-to-year projections.
translation.zh: 是我做的年度球员评估规则

translation.en: This is building in the intelligence that we have to project players.
translation.zh:
根据我们掌握的所有资讯
对球员进行评估

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: It's about getting things down to one number.
translation.zh: 将各种信息数字化

translation.en: Using the stats the way we read them...
translation.zh: 通过这样读取数值

translation.en: ...we'll find value in players that nobody else can see.
translation.zh:
能找到别人看不到的
球员潜在才能

translation.en: People are overlooked...
translation.zh: 有些人会被人忽视

translation.en: ...for a variety of biased reasons and perceived flaws.
translation.zh: 原因是某些偏见或者缺点

translation.en: Age, appearance, personality.
translation.zh: 比如年龄 外貌 性格

translation.en: Bill James and mathematics cut straight through that.
translation.zh:
比尔詹姆斯运用数学方法
摈弃这些不利因素

translation.en: Billy, of the 20,000 notable players for us to consider...
translation.zh:
比利 在我们可以挑选的
两万个球员之中

translation.en: ...I believe that there is a championship team...
translation.zh: 我相信我们可以选出一支冠军队

translation.en: ...of 25 people that we can afford...

你对此感觉如何？

translation.en: I feel good.
translation.zh: 感觉很好

translation.en: -How are the nerves in your fingers? -You know.
translation.zh:
-你手部的神经怎么样了？
-你知道

translation.en: Gotta start with the age, 36 years old.
translation.zh: 我先问年龄的问题 36岁

translation.en: How do you think your body's gonna hold up?
translation.zh: 你觉得你的身体应付得来吗？

translation.en: You spend a lot of time at strip clubs, partying.
translation.zh: 你经常去脱衣舞酒吧 参加派对

translation.en: Do you resent the attention you get off the field?
translation.zh:
人们很关注你在场下的生活
你对此反感吗？

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我很享受

translation.en: -You spend a lot of time in Vegas. -I do.
translation.zh:
-你经常在拉斯维加斯
-没错

translation.en: -I feel great. I did a lot of work to get-- -Excuse me. Get out of my shot.
translation.zh:
-我感觉很好 我做了很多准备
-抱歉 别挡住镜头

translation.en: Sorry, go ahead.
translation.zh: 好了 继续

translation.en: There have been questions about my age...
translation.zh: 有人质疑我的年龄问题

translation.en: ...and my declining skills, some say, but I'm here to prove that wrong.
translation.zh:
还说我的技术退步了
但我会证明他们是错的

translation.en: I asked if you were 100 percent.
translation.zh:
我问的是
你是否是百分之百的状态？

translation.en: -Excuse me, Mr. Beane? -Hey, Chad.
translation.zh:
-抱歉 宾恩先生？
-查德

translation.en: -Hey, I'm not disturbing you, am I? -Not at all. What's up?
translation.zh:
-我有没有打扰你？
-没有 什么事？

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you for this opportunity.
translation.zh: 我想感谢你给我这次机会

translation.en: Well, we enjoy having you. It's gonna work out well for all of us.
translation.zh:
我们很高兴你能加入
我们一起努力 打好比赛吧

translation.en: I appreciate it, sir. Nobody's ever given me a chance like this before.
translation.zh:
我很感激 先生
以前没有人给过我这样的机会

translation.en: Nobody?
translation.zh: 没有人？

translation.en: Well, just you, sir.
translation.zh: 只有你 先生

translation.en: Well, it's a big day, one you won't forget.
translation.zh:
今天是重要的一天
你会永远铭记的

translation.en: Appreciate it. And I wanna let you know...
translation.zh: 谢谢 我想让你知道

translation.en: ...I'm gonna be praying for you and your family.
translation.zh: 我会每天为你和你家人祈祷的

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 不必客气

translation.en: Well, here we are just minutes away from the season opener of 2002...
translation.zh:
各位 奥克兰运动家队
2002赛季的首场比赛

translation.en: ...for the Oakland A's.
translation.zh: 还有几分钟就要开始了

translation.en: The first pitch is moments away.
translation.zh: 第一局比赛即将开始

translation.en: We'll come back with the national anthem.
translation.zh: 国歌即将奏起

translation.en: Opening day is upon us.
translation.zh: 新赛季即将开始

translation.en: All right, fellas, smile. Here we go.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 走吧

translation.en: I'm going in. Text me the play-by-play.
translation.zh:
我要进去了
发短信告诉我比赛信息

translation.en: What? Why?
translation.zh: 什么？为什么？

translation.en: I don't watch the games.
translation.zh: 我不看比赛

translation.en: Detail, halt!
translation.zh: 立定

translation.en: And forward face!
translation.zh: 向后转

translation.en: That's the third Ranger batter to be hit today.
translation.zh: 这是游骑兵队今天第三记安打

translation.en: Twice Alex Rodriguez was nicked. The ninth--
translation.zh:
亚历克斯罗德里格斯的失误
已经第二次让队伍丢分了

translation.en: I should've made you a bigger part of the conversation from day one.
translation.zh:
从第一天开始
我就应该更认真地跟你谈

translation.en: It'd be clear what we're trying to do.
translation.zh: 让你更明白我们的思路

translation.en: That was my mistake, Art. I take responsibility for that.
translation.zh:
这是我的失误 亚蒂
我该负责

translation.en: -What are you trying to say? -Doesn't matter what moves I make...
translation.zh:
-你想说什么？
-不管我做了什么努力

translation.en: ...if you don't play the team the way they're designed to be.
translation.zh:
如果你不按照计划
去指挥这支球队

translation.en: Billy, you're out of your depth.
translation.zh: 比利 你不明白

translation.en: -Why not Hatteberg at first? -Because he can't play first.
translation.zh:
-为什么不让哈特博格当一垒手？
-因为他当不了一垒手

translation.en: -How do you know? -Not my first baseball game.
translation.zh:
-你怎么知道？
-这不是我的第一场棒球赛

translation.en: -Scott Hatteberg can't hit. -He gets on base.
translation.zh:
-斯考特哈特博格没办法击球
-他能上垒

translation.en: Still keeps us in the plus column. We need to be seven over .500.
translation.zh:
对我们而言 依然利大于弊
再赢七场 胜率就过半了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Anything else?
translation.zh: 还有什么吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I would've rather seen Bradford in the end than Magnante.
translation.zh:
最后一局我希望看到布拉德福德
而不是马格南特

translation.en: Bradford's a righty.
translation.zh: 布拉德福德是右手球员

translation.en: -I don't care about righty-lefty. -I do.
translation.zh:
-我不在乎右手左手
-我在乎

translation.en: -Could this be about your contract? -No.
translation.zh:
-是因为你合同的事吗？
-不是

translation.en: This is about you doing your job and me doing mine.
translation.zh:
是因为你做你的事
我做我的

translation.en: Mine's me being left alone...
translation.zh: 我的工作就是不受干涉地

translation.en: ...to manage this team you assembled for me.
translation.zh: 执教你组建的这支球队

translation.en: -I didn't assemble them for you, Art. -No shit.
translation.zh:
-球队不是为了你而组建的 亚蒂
-当然不是

translation.en: Good meeting.
translation.zh: 会谈愉快

translation.en: Every time we talk...
translation.zh: 每次我们谈话

translation.en: ...I'm reinvigorated by my love of the game.
translation.zh: 我对棒球的热爱都油然重生

translation.en: We got Grady Fuson, former head of scouting with the Athletics.
translation.zh:
我们采访到了格雷迪富森
运动家队的前任首席球探

translation.en: And, Grady, can you interpret for us what's going on?
translation.zh:
格雷迪 你能否向我们解释一下
到底发生了什么事？

translation.en: -They call it Moneyball. -Moneyball?
translation.zh:
-他们称之为魔球
-魔球？

translation.en: Yes, and it was a nice theory, and now it's just not working out.
translation.zh:
对 那是个不错的理论
只可惜行不通

translation.en: Billy Beane has built this team on the ideas of a guy, Bill James...
translation.zh:
比利宾恩的组队理念
是受到比尔詹姆斯的影响

translation.en: ...who wrote an interesting book on baseball statistics.
translation.zh: 他写了一本关于棒球数据的书

translation.en: The problem is that Bill James never played, never managed.
translation.zh:
问题是比尔詹姆斯没打过球
没当过教练

translation.en: He was in fact a security guard at a pork-and-beans company.
translation.zh: 他是一间猪肉大豆工厂的保安

translation.en: Do you see this as a decimation of the organization?
translation.zh: 斯托克里食品公司 你觉得球队会因此而一蹶不振吗？

translation.en: -He bought a ticket on the Titanic. -Oh, boy.
translation.zh:
-他这是买票坐上了泰坦尼克号
-天啊

translation.en: He's tried to come up with a new approach.
translation.zh: 他试着用新的执教方法

translation.en: My hat's off to him. It won't work.
translation.zh: 我尊敬他 但是这一套行不通

translation.en: One-two pitch. Tejada strikes out.
translation.zh: 两好一坏 泰伊达出局

translation.en: And that is the game.
translation.zh: 比赛结束

translation.en: The Seattle Mariners win both games on this series, Ray.
translation.zh:
西雅图水手队
赢得了全部两场比赛 雷

translation.en: They've won 10 in a row. Seattle is 13 and 3.
translation.zh:
他们已经十连胜了
现在是13胜3负

translation.en: I can't watch this shit.
translation.zh: 我看不下去了

translation.en: Go on the road with the team.
translation.zh: 跟球队一起上路比赛

translation.en: You don't go on the road with the team.
translation.zh: 你不跟球队上路比赛

translation.en: -That's why I want you to do it. -Why don't you?
translation.zh:
-所以我才让你去
-你为什么不去？

translation.en: I can't develop personal relationships with these guys.
translation.zh: 我不能跟他们发展出私人情谊

translation.en: I gotta be able to trade them, send them down, sometimes cut them.
translation.zh:
这样才能舍得把他们卖了
有时候甚至解雇他们

translation.en: Which is something you should learn to do, by the way.
translation.zh: 这也是你应该学的

translation.en: I would never have to cut a player, unless you....
translation.zh: 我不可能需要解雇球员 除非你...

translation.en: -Oh, come on. -"Come on" what?
translation.zh:
-来吧
-来什么？

translation.en: -Let's practice. -No.
translation.zh:
-我们来练习一下
-不

translation.en: Yeah. I'm a player. You gotta cut me from the roster.
translation.zh: 我是个球员 你要来解雇我

translation.en: -No. -Go.
translation.zh:
-不
-开始

translation.en: -What do you mean, no? -No.
translation.zh:
-为什么不？
-不

translation.en: -Do it. -This is stupid.
translation.zh:
-开始
-这太傻了

translation.en: Part of the job, man.
translation.zh: 这是工作的一部分 伙计

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Billy, please have a seat. I need to talk to you for a minute.
translation.zh:
比利 请坐
我有话要跟你说

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: You've been a huge part of this team.
translation.zh: 你为球队做出了不小的贡献

translation.en: But sometimes you have to make decisions for the team.
translation.zh: 但有时候 球队必须做出抉择

translation.en: I'm sure you can understand.
translation.zh: 我想你肯定明白

translation.en: -You're cutting me? -I'm really sorry.
translation.zh:
-你要解雇我？
-我很抱歉

translation.en: I just bought a house here.
translation.zh: 我刚在这里买了间房子

translation.en: -Well.... -In Oakland.
translation.zh:
-这个...
-在奥克兰

translation.en: Well.... Well....
translation.zh: 这个...

translation.en: "Well.... Well...."? That's all you got to say?
translation.zh: 这个？这就是你想说的？

translation.en: My kid just started a new school.
translation.zh: 我的孩子刚上了一间新学校

translation.en: -They made friends. -That's....
translation.zh:
-认识了新的朋友
-那...

translation.en: You shouldn't pull them out in the middle of the year.
translation.zh: 你不应该在学期中让他们转学

translation.en: -You should wait. -What the hell are you talking about?
translation.zh:
-你应该等一等
-你在说什么鬼话？

translation.en: I don't know. I shouldn't have--
translation.zh: 我不知道 我不应该...

translation.en: I'm not gonna do this. I think this is stupid.
translation.zh: 我办不到 我觉得这太傻了

translation.en: I'm not gonna fire anybody, and this is dumb.
translation.zh: 我不会解雇任何人 这太傻了

translation.en: They're professional ballplayers. Just be straight with them.
translation.zh: 他们是职业球员 跟他们实话实说

translation.en: No fluff, just facts.
translation.zh: 无需说好听的话 说实话

translation.en: Pete, I gotta let you go. Jack's office will handle the details.
translation.zh:
彼得 我必须解雇你
杰克的办公室会处理细节

translation.en: That's it?
translation.zh: 就这样？

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: You rather get a bullet to the head or five to the chest and bleed to death?
translation.zh:
你宁愿被人一枪打中头部而死？
还是打中胸口五枪流血而死？

translation.en: Are those my only two options?
translation.zh: 只有这两个选项？

translation.en: Go on the road with the team.
translation.zh: 跟球队一起上路比赛吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Say, bro.
translation.zh: 兄弟

translation.en: -Let me ask you a question. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我问你一个问题
-好

translation.en: How come your boss doesn't travel with the team?
translation.zh: 为什么你老板不跟球队一起外出？

translation.en: He doesn't like to mingle with the players.
translation.zh: 他不想跟球员太熟

translation.en: Is that supposed to make us easier to cut?
translation.zh: 这样才更容易解雇我们吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道...

translation.en: And how come soda is a dollar in the clubhouse?
translation.zh:
为什么俱乐部里的苏打水
还要一美元？

translation.en: I never seen nothing like that.
translation.zh: 我从没见过这样的事

translation.en: Billy likes to keep the money on the field.
translation.zh: 比利想把钱都花到球场上

translation.en: Soda money?
translation.zh: 苏打水的钱？

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Where on the field is the dollar I'm paying for soda?
translation.zh:
我付的一美元
在场上用到哪里了？

translation.en: It's hard to see exactly...
translation.zh: 很难看到

translation.en: -...but it's there, yeah. -Yeah, it is hard to see.
translation.zh:
-但是确实存在
-很难看到

translation.en: I'm done.
translation.zh: 我问完了

translation.en: -Hey, Dad. -Hi, honey.
translation.zh:
-爸爸
-宝贝

translation.en: -How are you? -I'm good.
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-我很好

translation.en: -Was it bumpy? -It was okay.
translation.zh:
-旅途颠簸吗？
-还好

translation.en: So with this loss tonight, the Oakland Athletics...
translation.zh:
经过今晚的失利
奥克兰运动家队

translation.en: ...incredibly, have lost 14 of their last 17 games.
translation.zh:
已经不可思议地
输掉了17场比赛中的14场

translation.en: They are 10 games back in the American League West.
translation.zh:
2002年5月23日
美国联盟 西部 已经落后美国联盟西部赛区领头羊
10场的胜场

translation.en: Is it fair to say the experiment has failed?
translation.zh: 可不可以断言实验失败了？

translation.en: Well, absolutely. It was predictable.
translation.zh: 当然可以 这样的结果不难预测

translation.en: You don't wish anybody a lack of success...
translation.zh: 我们不能祝别人失败

translation.en: -...but the facts are in front of you. -You can't blame Art Howe.
translation.zh:
-但是事实摆在眼前
-不能怪亚蒂豪伊

translation.en: -No. -The fact of the matter is...
translation.zh:
-对
-问题是

translation.en: ...this is not about statistics, this is about people.
translation.zh:
棒球不是数字游戏
而是人在打的

translation.en: Art Howe is not the problem.
translation.zh: 问题不在亚蒂豪伊身上

translation.en: The problem is in the general manager's office...
translation.zh: 问题在管理层

translation.en: ...with Billy Beane.
translation.zh: 在比利宾恩身上

translation.en: The root of the problem for me is philosophical.
translation.zh: 在我看来 问题的根源很明显

translation.en: I said it before. This is fantasy baseball.
translation.zh: 我说过了 这是理想化的棒球

translation.en: Billy is just not thinking.
translation.zh: 比利没有在思考

translation.en: Start thinking about a new GM, making changes.
translation.zh:
是时候考虑一个新的经理
带来新的改变

translation.en: He never goes to the games.
translation.zh: 他每场比赛都不到场

translation.en: -This was very predictable. -He needs to look at what's going on.
translation.zh:
-这完全可以预测
-他需要看看比赛情况

translation.en: -The man needs to get real. -I want Billy Beane gone.
translation.zh:
-这个家伙需要回到现实中
-我希望比利宾恩离开

translation.en: Calling for Beane's head. I want your thoughts.
translation.zh:
比利宾恩的脑子里
到底在想着什么？

translation.en: The past 18 games, they've been shut out or scored one run four times.
translation.zh:
过去18场比赛中 他们有4次
得零分 或者只得了1分

translation.en: They're just not scoring enough.
translation.zh: 他们获得的分数太低了

translation.en: It's not just the offense, not Thad Bosley and the hitters.
translation.zh:
不仅是进攻的问题
不仅是泰德伯斯里和打击手的问题

translation.en: It's everything. If there was one thing you could pick out, you'd try to fix it...
translation.zh:
整个队都有问题
如果有一个问题 可以挑出来解决

translation.en: ...but just everything is in a funk right now.
translation.zh: 但现在一切都有问题

translation.en: What the hell am I doing?
translation.zh: 我到底在干什么？

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Look, Steve.
translation.zh: 听着 斯蒂夫

translation.en: I believe in what we're doing.
translation.zh: 我对我们所做的一切有信心

translation.en: The record doesn't reflect the strength of this team...
translation.zh: 战绩并不能反应球队的全部实力

translation.en: ...or where we're gonna be at the end of the season.
translation.zh:
也无法代表我们赛季末
会取得的排名

translation.en: Now, Pete and I here feel very strongly that we stay on the track we've chosen.
translation.zh:
彼得和我都确信
我们会踏上设计好的轨道

translation.en: Our sample size has been too small. It's too--
translation.zh: 我们的样本数据还不够多

translation.en: Early. It's still early.
translation.zh: 下结论为时过早

translation.en: Where do we expect to be by the All-Star break?
translation.zh:
到全明星赛的时候
我们预计会有怎样的排名？

translation.en: Our goal and our expectation...
translation.zh: 我们的目标和期望是

translation.en: ...is by mid-July to be within seven games of first.
translation.zh:
到了七月中
与领头羊相距七个胜场

translation.en: That would be this working.
translation.zh: 前提是我们的方法行得通

translation.en: -That keeps us in the hunt. -Exceptionally well.
translation.zh:
-那样我们还有机会
-完全行得通

translation.en: -By July. -July.
translation.zh:
-七月
-七月

translation.en: And what's gonna prevent you from accomplishing that?
translation.zh: 达成这个目标有什么障碍？

translation.en: What are you afraid of?
translation.zh: 你担心的是什么？

translation.en: Nothing. That's why we're here, Steve.
translation.zh:
没什么
所以我们才来这里 斯蒂夫

translation.en: That's why we get up in the morning. That's all we do.
translation.zh: 这就是我们每天醒来所做的事

translation.en: -More? -Yeah, a little more.
translation.zh:
-还要吗？
-再来一点

translation.en: -Don't tell your mother. -I won't.
translation.zh:
-别告诉妈妈
-我不会的

translation.en: -Chocolate sauce? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-巧克力酱？
-好

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 停

translation.en: -Big spoon or little spoon? -Little spoon.
translation.zh:
-大勺子还是小勺子？
-小勺子

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Dad, there's no way you're gonna lose your job, right?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你不会失业 对吧？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Well, I don't know. I'm just wondering. -Where'd you hear that?
translation.zh:
-我只是问一问而已...
-你从哪里听来的？

translation.en: Well, I go on the Internet sometimes.
translation.zh: 我有时候会上网

translation.en: Well, don't do that. Don't go on the Internet.
translation.zh: 不行 不能上网

translation.en: Or watch TV or read newspapers...
translation.zh: 看电视 看报纸

translation.en: ...or talk to people.
translation.zh: 跟别人聊天

translation.en: I don't talk to people. I just read stuff.
translation.zh: 我不会跟人聊天 我只看点东西

translation.en: Honey, everything's fine. Everything's fine.
translation.zh: 宝贝 一切都很好

translation.en: Really, you don't have to worry.
translation.zh: 真的 你不需要担心

translation.en: But if you lose your job, will you have to move away?
translation.zh:
但是 如果你失业了
你会搬走吗？

translation.en: Honey, I'm not gonna lose my job.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我不会失业的

translation.en: You don't have to worry.
translation.zh: 不需要担心

translation.en: -Okay. -Hey.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -There's no problem. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-没问题的
-好

translation.en: All right? I got uptown problems, which are not problems at all.
translation.zh:
我有很多小问题
但那些都算不上问题

translation.en: You're not worried, right?
translation.zh: 你不担心 对吧？

translation.en: -No, I'm not worried. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我不担心
-好

translation.en: Peña.

但我开始感觉好一点了

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-对

translation.en: What's your biggest fear?
translation.zh: 你最担心的是什么？

translation.en: A baseball being hit in my general direction.
translation.zh: 球朝我的要害飞过来

translation.en: That's funny. Seriously, what is it?
translation.zh: 你真幽默 好了 到底是什么？

translation.en: No, seriously, that is.
translation.zh: 真的 就这个了

translation.en: Well, hey, good luck with that.
translation.zh: 祝你好运

translation.en: Be social out there.
translation.zh: 要多社交才行

translation.en: -Social. -Social. Like a greeter at the Gap.
translation.zh:
-社交？
-社交 就像商店的店员一样

translation.en: Guy steps into your office, chat him up.
translation.zh:
有人进去你的办公室
就跟他聊天

translation.en: You're well-read. You went to school.
translation.zh: 你知识渊博 上过大学

translation.en: -Yeah. -Have some fun. Relax.
translation.zh:
-对
-好好享受 放松点

translation.en: Everyone wants to attack. Quit trying to attack.
translation.zh:
每个人都想进攻
别只想着进攻

translation.en: Let the game come to you, man. There's no clock on this thing.
translation.zh:
让比赛跟着你的节奏走
这运动没有时间限制

translation.en: This is a war of attrition.
translation.zh: 这是一场消耗战

translation.en: If I take more, I could even take a few strikes, but I'll get walked more.
translation.zh:
我可以放多几个球 甚至是好球
但我会被保送

translation.en: You get on base, we win. You don't, we lose.
translation.zh:
你能上垒 我们就赢
上不了 我们就输

translation.en: And I hate losing, Chavvie. I hate it.
translation.zh:
我不喜欢输球 查维
我憎恨输球

translation.en: I hate losing more than I even wanna win.
translation.zh:
我对输球的恨
甚至超过获胜的渴望

translation.en: And there's a difference.
translation.zh: 这两者是有区别的

translation.en: -No bunts. -Bunts is an out.
translation.zh:
-不要触击短打
-短打就意味着一个人出局

translation.en: -Even if the third baseman is back? -No bunting whatsoever.
translation.zh:
-就算三垒手后退也不行吗？
-任何时候都不行

translation.en: If someone bunts on us, throw it to first.
translation.zh:
如果对方对我们实行短打
把球扔回一垒

translation.en: Don't be a hero and go to second.
translation.zh: 别逞英雄想双杀

translation.en: Let them make the mistakes.
translation.zh: 等他们犯错

translation.en: When your enemy's making mistakes, don't interrupt them.
translation.zh:
你的对手犯错的时候
不要打断他们

translation.en: They're giving you an out. Just giving it to you.
translation.zh: 他们是主动地出局 主动的

translation.en: Take it. Say thank you.
translation.zh: 只需要接受 说谢谢

translation.en: Another thing. No more stealing.
translation.zh: 还有一件事 不能盗垒

translation.en: That's what I do, what you pay me to do.
translation.zh:
但是我擅长盗垒
你雇我来就是让我来盗垒的

translation.en: I pay you to get on first, not get thrown out at second.
translation.zh:
我雇你是让你站上一垒
不是在二垒被接杀

translation.en: This is a process. It's a process, it's a process. Okay?
translation.zh: 这是个过程 过程 明白吗？

translation.en: Jason takes it, goes to second for the only out, and the A's get a run.
translation.zh:
杰森接住球 扔给二垒
运动家队得一分

translation.en: Jermaine Dye homers again, his second in two games.
translation.zh:
杰迈恩戴又打出全垒打
这是两场比赛中的第二次了

translation.en: And the A's are still hanging in. We'll get you scores here.
translation.zh:
2002年5月23日 周四 运动家队依然很艰难
这是目前的积分

translation.en: The A's pull within two of the Angels for the wild-card chase.
translation.zh:
运动家队与天使队的差距被缩小了
只需两场就能得到外卡资格

translation.en: The Reds have now dropped five in a row...
translation.zh: 红袜队已经连丢五分了

translation.en: ...as Oakland beats them in the beginning of this series 5 to 3.
translation.zh:
在这场系列赛中
奥克兰队开场以5比3领先

translation.en: Tejada walks.
translation.zh: 泰伊达被保送

translation.en: Ball four.
translation.zh: 四坏球

translation.en: Ball four and Hatteberg walks.
translation.zh: 四坏球 哈特博格被保送上垒

translation.en: What is happening in Oakland? The A's have won seven in a row.
translation.zh:
奥克兰发生了什么？
运动家队已经连胜七场

translation.en: A lot of excitement. What a winning streak.
translation.zh: 充满活力 势不可挡

translation.en: But how about the calming influence of Art Howe?
translation.zh: 是不是亚蒂豪伊稳定住了军心？

translation.en: When you say "your source," if it's not me or Peter, they don't know.
translation.zh: 如果不是我或者彼得 他们不知道

translation.en: He's managing an unorthodox team.
translation.zh: 他带领着一支不同寻常的队伍

translation.en: -Right. -It's not a perfect roster.
translation.zh:
-没错
-这阵容并不出色

translation.en: But right now, Art Howe is the reason this team is winning.
translation.zh:
但是现在亚蒂豪伊
正是这支球队获胜的原因

translation.en: -He deserves the credit. -Great, thanks. Bye.
translation.zh:
-他理应得到赞扬
-好 谢谢 再见

translation.en: Did you hear that?
translation.zh: 听到了吗？

translation.en: I heard "seven in a row." You get the Cleveland matchups?
translation.zh:
我只听到连胜七场
拿到克里夫兰的出场名单了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, right here.
translation.zh: 在这里

translation.en: -Voos. -Billy.
translation.zh:
-布斯
-比利

translation.en: -That smell is getting worse. -I'm on it.
translation.zh:
-味道越来越重了
-我会处理的

translation.en: -What are we doing? -Splitting it in half?
translation.zh:
-今晚怎么样？
-一半一半吧

translation.en: -Both sides of the plate. -Got it.
translation.zh:
-两边都要
-明白

translation.en: -Huddy. Mix it up. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-哈迪 记得变换球路
-是

translation.en: -Trust your slider, yeah? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-相信你的旋转球
-是

translation.en: You guys quit distracting him.
translation.zh: 你们不要打扰他了

translation.en: You couldn't hit that shit last night with a paddle.
translation.zh: 你昨晚不应该打那些烂球

translation.en: You gotta see more pitches.
translation.zh: 多等几个球

translation.en: -All right, Billy. -Patience.
translation.zh:
-是 比利
-耐心

translation.en: -Hey, David. -Hey, Billy.
translation.zh:
-大卫
-比利

translation.en: -Great at bats. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-打得很好
-谢谢

translation.en: -Really quality. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
-非常出色
-谢谢

translation.en: Base hit to right field. Tejada scores.
translation.zh: 右外野安打 泰伊达得分了

translation.en: Chavez coming in. The ball gets past Guiel.
translation.zh:
查韦斯也跑回来了
球从盖尔身边飞过

translation.en: The A's, from 5-nothing down, now lead 6 to 5.
translation.zh:
运动家队从0比5落后
到6比5领先

translation.en: The Oakland A's are completely out of hand at the moment.
translation.zh: 奥克兰运动家队现在炙手可热

translation.en: They are an AL-best 17 and 4 this month.
translation.zh: 本月取得了联盟最佳的17胜4负

translation.en: They also took back-to-back series at Boston and at New York.
translation.zh:
赢下了和波士顿的背靠背比赛
以及对阵纽约的比赛

translation.en: Remember when they traded Jeremy Giambi in June...
translation.zh:
还记得吗？
他们六月卖走了杰莱米吉安比

translation.en: ...and everyone thought they'd just given up?
translation.zh: 大家都以为他们放弃了

translation.en: Actually, not so much.
translation.zh: 但事实并非如此

translation.en: Suzanne, get Shapiro on the phone.
translation.zh: 2002年 球员交易截止日 苏珊 帮我接夏皮罗

translation.en: -You thinking Rincon? -His season's done. He's lost faith.
translation.zh:
-你想要林肯？
-他的赛季结束了 失去信心了

translation.en: -I think he's gonna dump him. -Hard-core.
translation.zh:
-我猜夏皮罗会抛弃他的
-猜得妙啊

translation.en: Shapiro on 2.
translation.zh: 夏皮罗在二号线

translation.en: Mark, Billy. Let's be honest.
translation.zh:
马克 我是比利
我们开门见山吧

translation.en: A premier setup man isn't gonna get you closer to the play-offs.
translation.zh:
靠一个后援投手
是不可能让你们进季后赛的

translation.en: -Are you referring to Rincon? -He's a luxury you can't afford, man.
translation.zh:
-你指的是林肯？
-他是你用不起的奢侈品 伙计

translation.en: And you can? There's half a million on his contract.
translation.zh: 你用得起？他的合约有五十万美元

translation.en: And we've got at least one other suitor.
translation.zh: 而且要买他的人不止一个

translation.en: By "at least one," you mean one.
translation.zh: 不止一个 也就是一个

translation.en: -Who is it? -I'd rather not say.
translation.zh:
-是谁？
-我不想说

translation.en: -San Francisco. -San Francisco.
translation.zh:
-旧金山
-旧金山

translation.en: I'll call you back.
translation.zh: 我回头再打给你

translation.en: What do you think we can get for Magnante?
translation.zh: 你觉得马格南特能换谁？

translation.en: Nothing.
translation.zh: 谁都换不到

translation.en: -What's left on Venafro's contract? -Two seventy-five.
translation.zh:
-韦纳夫罗的合同还剩多少？
-27.5万

translation.en: Suzanne, get me Sabean on the line.
translation.zh: 苏珊 帮我接赛宾恩

translation.en: Get the Giants interested in Venafro, Mark's only got one buyer for Rincon.
translation.zh:
让巨人队对韦纳夫罗感兴趣
只有一个买家向马克求购林肯

translation.en: -Us. -On 3.
translation.zh:
-我们
-三号线

translation.en: Saby-Sabster, it's Billy. What do you think of Venafro?
translation.zh:
赛宾恩 我是比利
你觉得韦纳夫罗怎么样？

translation.en: I can let you have him for almost nothing.
translation.zh: 我可以半卖半送让给你

translation.en: -Why would you do that? -Because I'm amazing.
translation.zh:
-你为什么这样做？
-因为我人很好

translation.en: I want a couple bucks and a sweetener.
translation.zh: 我只要一点钱 加一点甜头

translation.en: Throw in, say....
translation.zh: 比如

translation.en: -Anderson. -Anderson.
translation.zh:
-安德森
-安德森

translation.en: -I like Anderson. -No, you don't. Nobody likes him.
translation.zh:
-我喜欢安德森
-你不喜欢 没人喜欢他

translation.en: I don't know why I'm doing this. But let's do it.
translation.zh:
我不知道我为什么这样做
但是就这样吧

translation.en: Venafro for Michaelson. Anderson. I don't know his name.
translation.zh:
韦纳夫罗换迈可森
安德森 我连他的名字都不知道

translation.en: -I'll think about it. -Think about it and call me back.
translation.zh:
-我会考虑的
-考虑之后打电话给我

translation.en: Get Shapiro on.
translation.zh: 接夏皮罗

translation.en: Shapiro's on 2.
translation.zh: 夏皮罗在二号线

translation.en: -Mark. -You can't afford him, Billy.
translation.zh:
-马克
-你请不起他 比利

translation.en: You sure about that?
translation.zh: 你确定？

translation.en: I get the impression the market for Rincon is softening.
translation.zh:
我怎么觉得
林肯没什么市场价值了？

translation.en: I could be wrong, but I'd call whoever's interested...
translation.zh:
也可能是我猜错了
要是我 我会打电话给感兴趣的人

translation.en: ...and see if they're still interested. Call me back.
translation.zh:
看看他们还是否感兴趣
打电话给我吧

translation.en: -What about the Mets for Venafro? -You offered him to the Giants.
translation.zh:
-韦纳夫罗卖给大都会怎么样？
-你刚提出要卖给巨人队

translation.en: Suzanne, Steve Phillips.
translation.zh: 苏珊 斯蒂夫菲利普斯

translation.en: Between Bonds, Kent, Nen, Snow, San Francisco's never gonna do it.
translation.zh:
有邦德斯 肯特 南 斯诺
旧金山队不可能同意的

translation.en: -Totally agree. -We just need them to cool on Rincon.
translation.zh:
-没错
-只需要他们好好考虑林肯的事

translation.en: -Phillips on 2. -Steve-o, it's Billy.
translation.zh:
-菲利普在二号线
-斯蒂夫 我是比利

translation.en: I hear you're looking for a reliever. I can give you Venafro.
translation.zh:
据说你在找左手后援投手
我可以给你韦纳夫罗

translation.en: -I can make it quick and easy. -What's the angle?
translation.zh:
-马上就能让给你
-有什么企图？

translation.en: -No angle. -Who am I getting fleeced for?
translation.zh:
-没有企图
-那你想拐走谁？

translation.en: -Hang on a sec. -Bennett, maybe?
translation.zh:
-等等
-本内特怎么样？

translation.en: -How old? -Twenty-six.
Twenty-six, Double-A? Forget it.
translation.zh: 26？还在青训？算了吧

translation.en: Duncan, no.
translation.zh: 邓肯 不行

translation.en: No. Furbush, no.
translation.zh: 菲巴什 不行

translation.en: Eckerton? Eckerton? Eckerton.
translation.zh: 艾克顿？艾克顿

translation.en: -Eckerton. -Eckerton? I like Eckerton.
translation.zh:
-艾克顿
-艾克顿？我喜欢艾克顿

translation.en: -You don't even know who Eckerton is. -Is Venafro hurt?
translation.zh:
-你连艾克顿是谁都不知道
-韦纳夫罗受伤了吗？

translation.en: No, he's fine, he's fine. It's just an issue for us.
translation.zh:
没有 他很好
只是我们内部的问题

translation.en: -Last couple times, he got hammered. -Not his fault.
translation.zh:
-有几次 他击球都打偏了
-不是他的错

translation.en: -That was us. We misused him. -It's Steve.
translation.zh:
-怪我们 使用不当
-是斯蒂夫

translation.en: -I'm almost done. -Steve Schott.
translation.zh:
-我们快结束了
-斯蒂夫索特

translation.en: Look, Steve-o, let me be straight with you.
translation.zh: 斯蒂夫 我们开门见山吧

translation.en: Here's the deal. I'm getting Rincon. It's a done deal.
translation.zh:
是这样的 我要林肯
已经谈好了

translation.en: -I heard the Giants-- -Giants want Venafro for Michaelson.
translation.zh:
-据说巨人队...
-巨人队想用迈可森换韦纳夫罗

translation.en: -Anderson. -I'd rather deal with you.
translation.zh:
-安德森
-我宁愿换给你

translation.en: You can give me Eckerton and $225,000 in cash...
translation.zh: 你可以给我艾克顿加22万5千美元

translation.en: ...and the Giants can't.
translation.zh: 巨人队给不了

translation.en: -I'll think about it. -Think about it.
translation.zh:
-我会考虑的
-好好考虑吧

translation.en: But whoever calls me back first gets Venafro.
translation.zh:
先打电话给我的人
就能买到韦纳夫罗

translation.en: Schott hung up.
translation.zh: 索特挂断了

translation.en: Oh, I want this one.
translation.zh: 我要这个

translation.en: Why isn't anybody calling?
translation.zh: 为什么没人打电话来？

translation.en: Shapiro's on 2.
translation.zh: 夏皮罗在二号线

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 你好？

translation.en: Okay, let me talk to my owner. I'll call you back.
translation.zh: 好 我跟老板谈谈 回头再打给你

translation.en: -Get Steve on the phone. -Schott or Phillips?
translation.zh:
-接斯蒂夫
-索特还是菲利普？

translation.en: Why would we call Phillips? Phillips has gotta call us.
translation.zh:
为什么打给菲利普？
菲利普一定会打给我们

translation.en: Tell him I'm on the other line.
translation.zh: 告诉他 我在另一条线上

translation.en: Hi, Mr. Schott, it's Peter Brand. I apologize for putting you on hold.
translation.zh:
索特先生 我是彼得布兰德
很抱歉 刚才让你久等了

translation.en: -Billy asked me to call you back. -Tell him we want 225,000 for Rincon.
translation.zh:
-比利让我打电话回去给你
-告诉他 我们要22万5千买林肯

translation.en: Billy says he needs $225,000 for Ricardo Rincon.
translation.zh:
比利说 他需要22万5千
买里卡多林肯

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托了

translation.en: Yes, I added the "please" at the end.
translation.zh: 对 最后我说了"拜托了"

translation.en: Okay. Let me-- Hold on one second, please.
translation.zh: 好 请等等

translation.en: Tell him I'll pay for him.
translation.zh: 告诉他 钱我出

translation.en: But when I sell him back for twice the amount next year, I keep the money.
translation.zh:
但是如果明年我用双倍价钱卖出
钱归我

translation.en: Okay, so Billy says he'll pay for Rincon himself.
translation.zh: 比利说 他会自己出钱买林肯

translation.en: But when he sells him for more money next year, he's keeping the profit.
translation.zh:
但是如果明年卖出更高的价钱
利润归他

translation.en: Thank you very much. We'll call you back. Thank you.
translation.zh:
非常感谢
我们回头再打给你 谢谢

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
Suzanne, call Shapiro ba-- Never mind, I got him right here.
translation.zh:
苏珊 接夏皮罗...
不用了 他在这里

translation.en: Mark. Yeah.
translation.zh: 马克 对

translation.en: Listen, I don't want Rincon pitching against me tonight.
translation.zh:
我不希望林肯今晚
当我们的对手

translation.en: Tell him to change clothes and send him over. I got you the money.
translation.zh:
让他换衣服来我这里
我把钱给你

translation.en: Yup.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: I don't wanna dampen the mood at all, but since we picked up Rincon....
translation.zh:
我不想泼冷水
但是既然我们有了林肯

translation.en: We gotta send someone down.
translation.zh: 就必须赶走一个人

translation.en: -Mags. -Hey, Billy.
translation.zh:
-马格南特
-比利

translation.en: I know I've been struggling lately.
translation.zh: 我知道我最近状态不好

translation.en: But second half of the season, definitely turn it around. Ricky and I--
translation.zh:
但是下半赛季里肯定会好转
里奇和我...

translation.en: Mike, I need you to stop getting dressed.
translation.zh: 麦克 你不用换衣服了

translation.en: Traded?
translation.zh: 我被交易了？

translation.en: I'm sorry for the crap news.
translation.zh: 抱歉 给你带来坏消息

translation.en: I know it hurts.
translation.zh: 我知道你肯定很难受

translation.en: Mike, I can't have 26 guys in the clubhouse.
translation.zh:
麦克 一支球队
不能有26个人

translation.en: I get it. I get it.
translation.zh: 我明白...

translation.en: Okay. Thanks.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢

translation.en: Hey, Ricardo.
translation.zh: 里卡多

translation.en: This must be a bit of a shock, I guess.
translation.zh: 这一定让你大吃一惊吧

translation.en: Mabry hits one deep to right-center field.
translation.zh:
梅布里击中了
球飞到了右外野

translation.en: Racing back, Fick can't get it.
translation.zh: 菲克没接住

translation.en: It bounces to the wall. One run is in. Two runs are in.
translation.zh:
反弹到了墙上
一个得分 两个得分

translation.en: Mabry, on one pitch, has shot the A's in front.
translation.zh:
梅布里用这一个击球
让运动家队取得领先

translation.en: Strike three called. Twelve straight wins for the Athletics.
translation.zh:
连胜 三振出局
运动家队取得了12连胜

translation.en: Man alive, was it hairy.
translation.zh: 天啊 太不可思议了

translation.en: Something strange is now happening in Oakland.
translation.zh: 奥克兰发生了令人称奇的事

translation.en: -You cannot argue that point. -Twelve straight.
translation.zh:
-这一点毋容置疑
-12连胜

translation.en: They're making a joke out of the American League.
translation.zh: 他们让美国联盟无地自容

translation.en: -They were in Detroit today-- -He throws to first.
translation.zh:
-他们今天在底特律
-他传给一垒

translation.en: And that's the sound of 14 straight victories.
translation.zh: 这意味着他们取得了14连胜

translation.en: Fourteen, the longest run this year.
translation.zh: 14连胜 今年最长的连胜纪录

-天啊

-奥克兰

translation.en: Two.

translation.en: Safe.

translation.en: Safe.

奥克兰运动家队

运动家队完成了

translation.en: It's hard not to be romantic about baseball.

translation.en: This kind of thing, it's fun for the fans.

translation.en: Doesn't mean anything.

translation.en: That's when people get hurt.

-比利
-我了解他们

奥克兰队将自1992年以来 -首次杀入美联冠军赛

translation.zh: 打击率再高也没用

奥克兰运动家队
并不是一支完善的棒球队

translation.zh: 认为他们可以重新定义棒球

而仅仅做几道数学题

translation.en: -Thanks. -You're welcome.
translation.zh:
-谢谢

translation.en: Scarf.

translation.zh: 你是指羊毛的？

translation.en: No, I meant what women wear with.... You know, decorative.
translation.zh: 不是 是女人戴来当装饰品的

恕我直言 我已经连续两年

translation.en: Right.

斯蒂夫告诉我

因为我认为贝比鲁斯魔咒

-因为我听说你请了比尔詹姆斯

我一直想不懂

translation.en: Well, baseball hates him.
translation.zh: 因为棒球界恨他

translation.en: Well, baseball can hate him, you know.
translation.zh: 棒球界可以恨他

translation.en: One of the great things about money is that it buys a lot of things...
translation.zh:
钱的其中一项好处是
它可以买到很多东西

translation.en: ...one of which is the luxury to disregard what baseball likes...
translation.zh:
可以让你不必在乎
棒球界喜欢什么

translation.en: ...doesn't like, what baseball thinks, doesn't think.
translation.zh:
不喜欢什么 棒球界是怎么想的
不怎么想的

translation.en: Sounds nice.
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: Well, I was grateful for the call.
translation.zh: 感谢你的电话

translation.en: -You were grateful? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-感谢？
-对

translation.en: For 41 million, you built a play-off team.
translation.zh:
用四千一百万美元
你组建了一支打入季后赛的球队

translation.en: You lost Damon, Giambi, Isringhausen, Peña...
translation.zh:
你失去了戴蒙 吉安比
伊斯林霍森 佩纳

translation.en: ...and you won more games without them than you did with them.
translation.zh:
而你失去他们之后赢得的比赛
比失去前还多

translation.en: You won the exact same number of games that the Yankees won...
translation.zh: 你的获胜场次跟洋基队一样多

translation.en: ...but the Yankees spent 1.4 million per win...
translation.zh:
但是洋基队每场胜利的代价是
140万美元

translation.en: ...and you paid 260,000.
translation.zh: 而你是26万

translation.en: I know you're taking it in the teeth, but the first guy through the wall...
translation.zh:
我知道你受到不小的挫折
但是第一个冲破牢墙的人

translation.en: ...he always gets bloody.
translation.zh: 总得流点血

translation.en: Always. This is threatening not just a way of doing business...
translation.zh:
向来如此 这不仅威胁到
他们做生意的方式

translation.en: ...but in their minds, it's threatening the game.
translation.zh:
而且在他们看来
这威胁到这项运动

translation.en: Really, what it's threatening is their livelihood, their jobs.
translation.zh:
而真正威胁到的
是他们的生计 他们的工作

translation.en: It's threatening the way that they do things.
translation.zh: 威胁到他们的行事风格

translation.en: Every time that happens...
translation.zh: 每次出现这种事

translation.en: ...whether it's a government, a way of doing business, whatever...
translation.zh:
无论是政府行为
还是商业行为

translation.en: ...the people who are holding the reins...
translation.zh: 手握掌控权的人

translation.en: ...they have their hands on the switch...
translation.zh: 一手遮天的人

translation.en: ...they go batshit crazy.
translation.zh: 他们会发疯的

translation.en: I mean, anybody who's not tearing their team down right now...
translation.zh: 如果任何球队不把队伍解散

translation.en: ...and rebuilding it using your model...
translation.zh: 按照你的方式组队

translation.en: ...they're dinosaurs.
translation.zh: 他们就是即将灭绝的恐龙

translation.en: They'll be sitting on their ass on the sofa in October...
translation.zh:
他们到了10月
会呆坐在沙发上

translation.en: ...watching the Boston Red Sox win the World Series.
translation.zh: 看着波士顿红袜队赢得冠军

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 你这是什么意思？

translation.en: I want you to be my general manager. That's my offer.
translation.zh:
我邀请你当我的球队经理
这是我的报价

translation.en: Heads up.
translation.zh: 接好了

translation.en: What was that?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: -Sorry. I don't know. -What the hell was that?
translation.zh:
-抱歉 我不知道
-你到底是在干什么？

translation.en: You knucklehead.
translation.zh: 真是个疯子

translation.en: How was Boston?
translation.zh: 波士顿怎么样？

translation.en: Impressive.
translation.zh: 很不错

translation.en: Did Henry make you a good offer, at least?
translation.zh: 亨利有没有给你一个好价格？

translation.en: -Doesn't matter. Doesn't matter. -What was it? What was it?
translation.zh:
-不重要了
-是什么？

translation.en: -Doesn't matter. -What was it?
translation.zh:
-不重要了
-是什么？

translation.en: That makes you the highest-paid GM in the history of sports.
translation.zh:
你将成为体育史上
薪酬最高的球队经理

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 那又如何？

translation.en: So what?
translation.zh: 那又如何？

translation.en: I made one decision in my life based on money.
translation.zh:
我曾经做错一个决定
就是因为钱

translation.en: And I swore I would never do it again.
translation.zh: 我发誓再也不会重蹈覆辙

translation.en: You're not doing it for the money.
translation.zh: 不是为了钱

translation.en: -No? -No.
translation.zh:
-不是？
-不是

translation.en: You're doing it for what the money says.
translation.zh: 是为了这些钱的意义

translation.en: And it says what it says to any player that makes big money.
translation.zh:
代表着每个赚大钱的球员
都知道的意义

translation.en: That they're worth it.
translation.zh: 就是他们值得这个价

translation.en: What a dump.
translation.zh: 真是个破地方

translation.en: I really wanted to win here.
translation.zh: 我很想在这里赢球

translation.en: I really did.
translation.zh: 真的很想

translation.en: I think you won pretty big, Billy.
translation.zh: 我觉得你赢得够多了 比利

translation.en: Pete, we lost.
translation.zh: 彼得 我们输了

translation.en: We lost.
translation.zh: 我们输了

translation.en: It's only been a few days. Give yourself some time to get over it.
translation.zh:
只是几天前而已
给你自己点时间 忘了它吧

translation.en: Man, I don't get over these things. Ever.
translation.zh:
伙计 我忘不了这些事
永远忘不了

translation.en: Come with me to the video room. I wanna show you something.
translation.zh:
跟我到影音室吧
我有东西要给你看

translation.en: No, man, I'm not up for film right now.
translation.zh: 不 我现在不想看电影

translation.en: Come on. Seriously.
translation.zh: 走吧 我是认真的

translation.en: Come on, Billy. Come on.
translation.zh: 快 比利 快

translation.en: The Visalia Oaks...
translation.zh: 维萨利亚橡树队

translation.en: ...and our 240-pound catcher, Jeremy Brown...
translation.zh: 这是我们240磅的捕手杰莱米布朗

translation.en: ...who, as you know, is scared to run to second base.
translation.zh: 你应该知道 他不敢跑到二垒

translation.en: This was in a game six weeks ago.
translation.zh: 这是六周前的一场比赛

translation.en: This guy's gonna start with a fastball.
translation.zh: 这个家伙先投出一记快球

translation.en: Jeremy's gonna take him to deep center.
translation.zh: 杰莱米把球打到中后方

translation.en: Here's what's interesting...
translation.zh: 有趣的地方来了

translation.en: ...because Jeremy's gonna do what he never does.
translation.zh: 杰莱米做了他从未做过的事

translation.en: He's gonna go for it.
translation.zh: 他尝试了

translation.en: He's gonna round first and he's gonna go for it.
translation.zh: 他会绕过一垒 全力冲向二垒

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 明白吗？

translation.en: This is all of Jeremy's nightmares coming to life.
translation.zh: 杰莱米的恶梦 在这一刻全部终结

translation.en: -They're laughing at him. -And Jeremy's about to find out why.
translation.zh:
-他们在笑他
-杰莱米稍后才知道为什么

translation.en: Jeremy's about to realize...
translation.zh: 杰莱米刚发现

translation.en: ...that the ball went 60 feet over the fence.
translation.zh: 球已经飞出围栏20米

translation.en: He hit a home run and didn't even realize it.
translation.zh:
他打出了全垒打
而连他自己都不知道

translation.en: How can you not be romantic about baseball?
translation.zh: 你怎能不爱棒球？

translation.en: -It's a metaphor. -I know it's a metaphor.
translation.zh:
-我是在暗喻你
-我知道是在暗喻我

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Pete, you're a good egg.
translation.zh: 彼得 你是个好家伙

translation.en: I'll call you.
translation.zh: 我会打电话给你的

translation.en: Hey, Dad, this is the song I told you I'd record.
translation.zh:
爸爸 这是我上次说的
我要录的歌

translation.en: Please don't show it to anyone else.
translation.zh: 千万不要放给任何人听

translation.en: Let me know if you change your mind and stay in California.
translation.zh:
要是你改变主意 想留在加州
记得告诉我

translation.en: If not, you're a really great dad.
translation.zh: 否则的话 你依然是个好爸爸

translation.en: I'm just a little bit caught in the middle Life is a maze and love is a riddle
translation.zh:
我有点左右为难
生活是座迷宫 爱情是个迷

translation.en: I don't know where to go Can't do it alone, I've tried
translation.zh:
我不知何去何从
无法独自应对 我已经尽力

translation.en: And I don't know why
translation.zh: 但不知为何

translation.en: I'm just a little girl lost in the moment I'm so scared, but I don't show it
translation.zh:
我只是个迷茫的小女孩
心里充满恐惧 又不敢表露

translation.en: I can't figure it out It's bringing me down
translation.zh: 我没有办法 就快被击垮

translation.en: I know I've got to let it go
translation.zh: 我知道我必须放手

translation.en: And just enjoy the show
translation.zh: 默默地承受

translation.en: Slow it down, make it stop Or else my heart is going to pop
translation.zh:
慢下来 停下来
否则我的心就要碎了

translation.en: 'Cause it's too much Yeah, it's a lot
translation.zh: 因为这一切我承受不了

translation.en: To be something I'm not
translation.zh: 因为这不是我

translation.en: I'm a fool, out of love
translation.zh: 我是个傻瓜 没人爱

translation.en: And I just can't get enough
translation.zh: 可是却不能自拔

translation.en: I'm just a little bit caught in the middle Life is a maze and love is a riddle
translation.zh:
我有点左右为难
生活是座迷宫 爱情是个迷

translation.en: I don't know where to go Can't do it alone, I've tried
translation.zh:
我不知何去何从
无法独自应对 我已经尽力

translation.en: And I don't know why
translation.zh: 但不知为何

translation.en: You're such a loser, Dad You're such a loser, Dad
translation.zh: 你真是个失败者 爸爸

translation.en: You're such a loser, Dad
translation.zh: 你真是个失败者 爸爸

translation.en: Just enjoy the show
translation.zh: 只能默默承受
